doc:
Jack Hobbs (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Hobbs_(actor) 0 Jack Hobbs (28 September 1893 – 4 June 1968) was a British stage and film actor who appeared in more than forty films. After making his debut in the 1915 silent The Yoke Hobbs appeared in a mixture of leading and supporting roles in both the silent and sound eras. He played the hero in several quota quickies of the 1930s, including All That Glitters (1936). He was cast as an effectively glib, smooth-talking antagonist in two George Formby films No Limit (1935) and It's in the Air (1938). Jack_Hobbs ( 28_September_1893 – 4_June_1968 ) was a_British_stage_and_film_actor who appeared in more_than_forty_films . After making his_debut in the_1915_silent The_Yoke_Hobbs appeared in a_mixture of leading_and_supporting_roles in both the_silent_and_sound_eras . He played the_hero in several_quota_quickies of the_1930s , including All_That Glitters (_1936_) . He was_cast as an_effectively_glib_,_smooth-talking_antagonist in two_George_Formby_films No_Limit (_1935 ) and It 's in the_Air_(_1938_) .
